column1: Jesús María is a city in the Mexican state of Aguascalientes. It stands at 21°58′N 102°21′W and serves as the municipal seat of the surrounding municipality of Jesús María.

column2: the city of Jesús María had a population of 43
column4: making it the second largest city in the state. It is located so close to the state capital city of Aguascalientes
column6: that it has been swallowed by it
column7: rendering it part of the Aguascalientes metropolitan area (pop. 805
column9: with the function of a suburban area.

column1: It is also the sister city of Queen Creek
